projects.title: MatchMaker AI
projects.summary: NLP resume matcher ranking candidates by fit to a JD.
projects.description_html:
What it does

Helps recruiters quickly see which candidates match a job description.

How it works

  • Inputs: pasted resumes + one job description
  • Logic: compares text (TF-IDF now; embeddings later) to compute similarity
  • Output: a sorted list of best matches

What I built

  • JD & resume parsing
  • Similarity scoring + ranking
  • Simple demo UI

Impact

Target: cut screening time by ~35%.

Next

Add embeddings and an explainability panel listing matched skills.

projects.title: Automation ROI Tracker
projects.summary: SQL + BI model to quantify time and cost savings from automations.
projects.description_html:
What it does

Shows the business value of automations in hours and dollars saved.

How it works

  • Inputs: process times + volumes
  • Logic: SQL model + BI visuals
  • Output: KPI deltas and trend charts

Impact

Target: save ~8 hrs/mo reporting.

Next

Add scenario toggles and better source tracking.

projects.title: Recruiting Workflow Dashboard
projects.summary: Visualizes recruiting KPIs with automated updates via Sheets API.
projects.description_html:
What it does

Tracks time-to-fill, source quality, and compliance in one place.

How it works

  • Inputs: Google Sheets data
  • Logic: scheduled refresh + visuals
  • Output: KPI cards + drill-downs

Impact

Target: reduce manual reporting steps by 60%.

Next

Multi-location comparisons and cohort trends.
projects.impact: Target: reduce manual reporting steps by 60%

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.summary: Static-first GitHub Pages site with JSON-powered projects.
projects.description_html: Fast, clean, and content-first portfolio. Edit projects.json to add showcases without local setup.
